mapper.insert: insert into CBONDISSUERRATING ( object_id, s_info_compname, ann_dt, b_rate_style, b_info_creditrating, b_rate_ratingoutlook, b_info_creditratingagency, s_info_compcode, b_info_creditratingexplain, b_info_precreditrating, b_creditrating_change, b_info_issuerratetype, ann_dt2, opdate, opmode, imp_date, imp_time ) values ( #{objectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sInfoCompname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{annDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bRateStyle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bInfoCreditrating,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bRateRatingoutlook,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{bInfoCreditratingagency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sInfoCompcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bInfoCreditratingexplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bInfoPrecreditrating,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bCreditratingChange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bInfoIssuerratetype,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{annDt2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{opmode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{impDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{impTime,jdbcType=CHAR} )
